languages.text: "Император милосердный, чудовищное святотатство в исповеди! Что за еретик скрывается на корабле? И как мне очистить душу от услышанного? Оно жжет мой разум!"
"Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"
languages.original_text: "Император милосердный, чудовищное святотатство в исповеди! Что за еретик скрывается на корабле? И как мне очистить душу от услышанного? Оно жжет мой разум!"

traits.locale_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns, it burns my mind!"

"Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

languages.text: "Bei der Gnade des Imperators! Dieses Bekenntnis ist Blasphemie, schreckliche Blasphemie! Wer ist dieser Ketzer, der an Bord herumschleicht? Und wie reinige ich meine Seele von dem, was ich hörte? Es brennt! Es verbrennt meinen Verstand!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

traits.locale_text: "Bei der Gnade des Imperators! Dieses Bekenntnis ist Blasphemie, schreckliche Blasphemie! Wer ist dieser Ketzer, der an Bord herumschleicht? Und wie reinige ich meine Seele von dem, was ich hörte? Es brennt! Es verbrennt meinen Verstand!"

languages.text: « Par l'Empereur ! Ces aveux relèvent du pire blasphème ! Quel est donc cet hérétique qui rôde à bord ? Et comment purifier mon âme après ce que j'ai entendu ? Ça brûle ! Mon esprit est en feu ! »
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

traits.locale_text: « Par l'Empereur ! Ces aveux relèvent du pire blasphème ! Quel est donc cet hérétique qui rôde à bord ? Et comment purifier mon âme après ce que j'ai entendu ? Ça brûle ! Mon esprit est en feu ! »

languages.text: «¡Emperador, ten piedad! Esta confesión es una blasfemia espantosa! ¿Quién es este hereje que hay a bordo? ¿Y cómo puedo purgar mi alma de lo que he oído? ¡Me quema! ¡Me quema la mente!».
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Emperador, ten piedad! Esta confesión es una blasfemia espantosa! ¿Quién es este hereje que hay a bordo? ¿Y cómo puedo purgar mi alma de lo que he oído? ¡Me quema! ¡Me quema la mente!».

languages.text: 「皇帝よ慈悲をお与えください！この懺悔は冒涜だ、酷い冒涜だ！この船に潜んでいる異端者とは誰だ？どうすれば私の魂を清められるのだ？焼けるようだ！精神が焼かれてしまう！」
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝よ慈悲をお与えください！この懺悔は冒涜だ、酷い冒涜だ！この船に潜んでいる異端者とは誰だ？どうすれば私の魂を清められるのだ？焼けるようだ！精神が焼かれてしまう！」

languages.text: “愿帝皇垂怜！这样的忏悔是简直是亵渎，何等可怕的亵渎！这个潜伏在船上的异端分子究竟是谁？我听到了这些话，我该如何净化我的灵魂！那些亵渎的话在灼烧着我的思想！”
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇垂怜！这样的忏悔是简直是亵渎，何等可怕的亵渎！这个潜伏在船上的异端分子究竟是谁？我听到了这些话，我该如何净化我的灵魂！那些亵渎的话在灼烧着我的思想！”

languages.text: "İmparator'un merhameti adına! Günah çıkarma dediğiniz şey dine aykırı, hem de fena hâlde aykırı! Bu kâfirin gemide işi ne? Peki duyduklarımdan sonra ruhumu nasıl arındıracağım? Çok yakıyor! Beynimi yakıyor!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor's mercy! This confession is blasphemy, terrible blasphemy! Who is this heretic lurking aboard? And how do I cleanse my soul of what I've heard? It burns! It burns my mind!"
